messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

change tasks sent monday february re change tasks hi please log for below assign require small change assigned we apply change push regards applications manager sent february re change tasks hi well picking up old very old about creating task change seems though made into there small issue if you select for one tasks does continue please example change if you have look would be much appreciated we would like be able use option close tasks thanks telephone number address sent re change tasks hi colours represent way code different states can be more easily identified have set field have same colour closed skipped also work end field should populate when task moved any values mentioned by you please test let know case further changes required kind regards applications manager sent re change tasks hi better thanks what significance coloured next there one against closed skipped closed complete if possible can we have same closed skipped lastly can we have date stamped work end same closed complete think also be required for closed skipped we can then glance when task was closed screen shout change telephone number address sent re change tasks hi should be fixed environment can you please check regards applications manager sent re change tasks hi sorry for delay coming back you have had few days off closed action required reference if select closed action required then save changes closed complete back change show closed complete well managed get stay closed action required but how did cannot replicate assignee owner editable list view works thanks very much what issues with adding other fields same list view seems be off by default checking we opening ourselves up hole thanks telephone number address sent re change tasks hi changes environment please test whether working expected was added set make record inactive when selected assignee owner field should also be editable list view kind regards applications manager sent re change tasks hi change task we would like additional option for current options above task still go through current process pending then open but we would need be same closed change goes implemented when tasks closed whether complete incomplete skipped or action required makes sense telephone number address sent re change tasks hi adding raises few additional questions most transitions between states controlled by buttons change form would you need button created move change or would be manually regards applications manager sent re change tasks hi attached field we like value be added for second point we ideally like for other records but begin with editing assignee would help would save having dive into each task assign cheers change control presence manager managed mob sent re change tasks hi can you please confirm exact name field or provide we need add value regarding second point can be done you need only for assignee owner field regards applications manager sent change tasks hi discussions with regarding getting volume open tasks reduced approved changes couple things came out those discussions two slight alterations within add closure description closed action required be able alter task records assign owner without going into task directly screen grab attached side fence ll be communicating tasks must have assignee owner before closed if we good progress we ll make mandatory again cheers change control presence manager managed mob

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing IT ticket**

I need to classify this IT ticket based on the long description provided by the user. The content includes topics like "change tasks" and references an application manager, suggesting it might be about modifying task statuses within a tracking system. It seems appropriate to label it as "Internal Project," indicating it's about managing internal processes or software changes. While "Administrative rights" might fit, it's more focused on project management. So, "Internal Project" feels like the best option to classify it.{"type":"object","properties":{"category":"Internal Project"}}{"type":"object","properties":{"category":"Internal Project"}}{"type":"object","properties":{"category":"Internal Project"}}{"category":"Internal Project"}
